content.raw:
Thanks for reporting this! Please use the names listed in the documentation. It looks like there was an inconsistency in some of the early test examples, but the later [trial worlds released](#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/Phase2_Task_Testing_2019) and the actual worlds used for phase 2 should match the documentation. 

We’ve created PR #217 to fix the inconsistency. Once it’s merged, everything should match \(you will need to pull the latest code and rebuild to see the change\). Please let us know if this does not resolve the issue for you.

I’ll also put up a forum post to clarify that the documentation has the correct name.
content.html:
Thanks for reporting this! Please use the names listed in the documentation. It looks like there was an inconsistency in some of the early test examples, but the later trial worlds released and the actual worlds used for phase 2 should match the documentation.

We’ve created PR #217 to fix the inconsistency. Once it’s merged, everything should match (you will need to pull the latest code and rebuild to see the change). Please let us know if this does not resolve the issue for you.

I’ll also put up a forum post to clarify that the documentation has the correct name.
